backFields.label: WHERE
backFields.value: Shopify (6th floor), 150 Elgin St, Ottawa, ON K2P 1L4

backFields.label: Richard Martin
backFields.value:
Google Firebase is a mobile, server-side platform that helps developers quickly develop high-quality apps, and allows companies to grow their user base and earn more money. Firebase provides a comprehensive set of APIs for iOS, Android and web developers.

Firebase is ideal for mobile startups who want a low cost way to quickly develop and market-validate an app. It can also find a home with established companies that want to quickly turn mobile apps for special events like promotional marketing campaigns.

Richard Martin, a Silicon Valley veteran who has worked at Apple, Cisco and Broadcom, will deliver a detailed presentation on how he used Google Firebase as the backend for his latest iOS app.

Developers will learn how to use Firebase as the backend for their apps.

Mobile startups will learn how to leverage this technology to solve customer problems instead of devoting their precious resources building a complex infrastructure for their app.

backFields.label: Mohamed El-Halawani
backFields.value: Steps to create a CoreData model as framework and include it in your project.

backFields.label: SUGGEST YOUR PICTURE
backFields.value: Email the organizer with your picture and license. Dimensions are exactly 360 x 440. Picture will be blurred automatically by Passbook.
